channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation – release-notes
channel.description: Recent changes in release-notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Changelog
item.description: 2021-05-24 Add FreeChild/Baby at RatePlan level in HotelRatePlanInventoryNotif and HotelRatePlanNotif requests. Please check our API to find more information. 2019-06-04 Deletion order when value is -1

item.title: Insights-X: Release Notes
item.description: <a href="/insights-x/release-notes/roadmap/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-road"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Roadmap</h3> <p>We have created a GitHub Project where we will keep you updated with all the future modifications regarding this Project</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/insights-x/release-notes/changelog/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-exchange"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Insights-X changelog</h3> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Travelgatex: Release Notes
item.description:
<a href="/travelgatex/release-notes/roadmap/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-road"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Roadmap</h3> <p>We have put together a GitHub Project where we will keep updating on the things we’ve in our plans.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons"><img width="24px" src="/images/graphql.svg"/></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema Changes</h3> <p>It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes.</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/release-notes/breaking-changes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-eraser"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">GraphQL Schema breaking changes</h3> <p>Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/release-notes/products-changelogs/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons"><img width="24px" src="/images/isotype_travelgatex.
[...]
